entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
